title: The Capital of Crits
goal: Artie must navigate the social and political landscape of the capital while avoiding the 'System Police'.
stakes_shift: The threat moves from physical monsters to social exposure and the risk of permanent character deletion.

bridge.from_prev: Artie arrives at the capital as a fugitive from Vane's ego.
bridge.to_next: Artie enters the Grand Arena tournament to win a way to fix his HP.

sections.title: The City of Gold and Glitches
sections.intent: Establish the capital city and the religious weight of 'Crits'.

scenes.summary: Artie enters the city and sees the 'Temple of the D20,' where priests pray for high rolls.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes he is basically a walking god in this religion, connecting his fate to the First Glitch.

scenes.summary: Artie tries to find a 'Stat-Wiper' to fix his 1 HP, but finds out it's a crime punishable by 'Deletion'.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes his 1 HP build is permanent and illegal to fix.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie realizes his 1 HP build is permanent and illegal to fix.

sections.title: The Underground Market
sections.intent: Artie looks for illegal mods to help him survive.

scenes.summary: Fizz leads Artie to a black market run by a group of 'Dev-Haters' who sell items that bypass System rules.
scenes.outcome: Artie gains access to a 'Lag-Switch' potion.

scenes.summary: Artie meets Zero, a black-market informant who tells him that Vane is the son of the High Priest of RNG.
scenes.outcome: The rivalry with Vane just became a religious war.

scenes.summary: The black market is raided by the 'System Sentinels,' and Artie has to use his first 'Lag-Switch' to escape.
scenes.outcome: Artie escapes a Sentinel raid with a Lag-Switch potion and a binary speech curse.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie escapes a Sentinel raid with a Lag-Switch potion and a binary speech curse.

sections.title: The Arena Invitation
sections.intent: Set up the tournament climax and the high financial stakes.

scenes.summary: Artie sees a flyer for the 'Grand Crit-Off,' where the prize is a 'Shield of Infinite Health'.
scenes.outcome: Artie decides to enter, despite the risk of exposure.

scenes.summary: Artie registers under the name 'Crit-iculous' and accidentally sets his entry fee to 'All My Gold'.
scenes.outcome: Artie is now broke and must win the tournament to survive.

scenes.summary: Vane sees the name on the roster and smiles, knowing he can finally 'delete' Artie in front of a crowd.
scenes.outcome: Vane prepares to 'delete' Artie in the upcoming tournament.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Vane prepares to 'delete' Artie in the upcoming tournament.
